Sentencas: The effects of flow configuration in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks are investigated using a quasi-three-dimensional numerical model.
Titulo: Quasi-three-dimensional numerical simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell short stack: Effects of flow configurations including air-flow alternation

Sentencas: Flow configurations with alternated air flows in parallel and perpendicular to the fuel flows are considered in addition to the conventional co-, counter-, and cross-flow configurations.
Titulo: Quasi-three-dimensional numerical simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell short stack: Effects of flow configurations including air-flow alternation

Sentencas: The stacks have eight cells with unity aspect ratio and an active area of 4900 mm(2) and are compared at fuel utilization of 0.193, 0.386, 0.579, and 0.772.
Titulo: Quasi-three-dimensional numerical simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell short stack: Effects of flow configurations including air-flow alternation

Sentencas: The numerical model is capable of analyzing both the streamwise and spanwise directions of the cells.
Titulo: Quasi-three-dimensional numerical simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell short stack: Effects of flow configurations including air-flow alternation

Sentencas: Although the counter-flow stack achieves the highest voltage efficiency among the stacks with the conventional flow configurations, it has the highest dispersion of the current density distribution on the cells.
Titulo: Quasi-three-dimensional numerical simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell short stack: Effects of flow configurations including air-flow alternation

Sentencas: Air-flow alternation is effective to achieve uniform and high cell temperature and hence low dispersion of the current density.
Titulo: Quasi-three-dimensional numerical simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell short stack: Effects of flow configurations including air-flow alternation

Sentencas: Alternate air flows parallel to the fuel flows achieve the highest voltage efficiency of 0.797 at a fuel utilization of 0.772, while alternate air flows perpendicular to the fuel flows reduce the risk of local fuel depletion as compared with the cross-flow stacks.
Titulo: Quasi-three-dimensional numerical simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell short stack: Effects of flow configurations including air-flow alternation

Sentencas: Appropriate selection of the air-flow configuration within stacks allows operation at higher efficiency without fuel depletion.
Titulo: Quasi-three-dimensional numerical simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell short stack: Effects of flow configurations including air-flow alternation
